dialogues.text: Hi there! How nice of you to stop by. My name's Tony.
If you have some time, I can teach you how to train your Farming skill.

options.text: I would like to learn how Farming works.

dialogues.text: Excellent! There are some simple concepts to remember when you wish to grow your own produce.
First, you will need seeds to plant. Mind the type of Farming Patch, as not all seeds are suitable for every patch.
Secondly, you must have the required level to plant seeds. An overview can be found in your Skills menu.
Optionally, you may use a watering can to water the seeds. This will decrease the time until the seed has fully grown.
Additionally, you may use compost to decrease the chance of your produce catching disease.
And that's it! Would you like me to repeat this or are you ready to get your hands dirty?

options.text: Could you repeat that once more?

dialogues.text: Great! Here are some seeds to get your started.
You may plant the seeds in the patch next to my house. They will take some time to grow, so you may want to do something else in the meantime.
